translation.en: [narrator] Though many know the tragic love story of Antony and Cleopatra,
translation.zh: 尽管很多人都知道安东尼和克里奥佩特拉的悲剧爱情故事

translation.en: the wayward Roman general
translation.zh: 刚愎自用的罗马将军

translation.en: who fell madly in love with the enchanting Egyptian queen,
translation.zh: 疯狂爱上迷人的埃及艳后

translation.en: both of them taking their lives
translation.zh: 二人双双选择自杀

translation.en: rather than face a world without each other,
translation.zh: 不愿面对没有彼此的世界

translation.en: few know the secret story
translation.zh: 但很少有人知道

translation.en: of the most sought-after prize and unsolved puzzle of their time.
translation.zh: 无数人都在找寻他们那个时代的宝物和未解之谜

translation.en: The mystery of Cleopatra's third egg.
translation.zh: 克里奥佩特拉神秘的第三颗蛋

translation.en: On their wedding day, as a symbol of his undying devotion,
translation.zh: 在他们婚礼当天为了展现他永恒的忠诚

translation.en: Mark Antony presented Cleopatra with three bejeweled eggs,
translation.zh: 马克安东尼送给克里奥佩特拉三颗缀满珠宝的蛋

translation.en: each one more exquisite than the last.
translation.zh: 一颗比一颗精致

translation.en: For centuries, these eggs were thought to be nothing more than myth, rumor.
translation.zh: 几十个世纪以来人们都以为那只是神话传说

translation.en: But then, in 1907,
translation.zh: 但在1907年

translation.en: just outside of Cairo, a local farmer unearthed two of them.
translation.zh: 开罗城外一个当地农民从地里挖出了其中两颗蛋

translation.en: Some say the third egg was never found.
translation.zh: 有人说第三颗蛋从未有人找到过

translation.en: Others claim it was discovered,
translation.zh: 也有人说找是找到了

translation.en: but just as quickly lost, never to be seen again.
translation.zh: 但很快又消失了 从此再未现身

translation.en: Join us as we explore that very question.
translation.zh: 和我们一起来探究这个问题吧

translation.en: What happened to Cleopatra's lost egg?
translation.zh: 克里奥佩特拉丢失的蛋到底怎么了？

translation.en: Who may hold it in their possession?
translation.zh: 它会在谁手上？

translation.en: And most importantly, will we ever see the day in which
translation.zh: 最重要的是 是否能有这么一天

translation.en: all three eggs are reunited for the first time in over 2,000 years?
translation.zh: 让三颗蛋在两千多年后首次重聚？

translation.en: Cleopatra's first egg is on display for all to see
translation.zh: 克里奥佩特拉的第一颗蛋

translation.en: at the world-famous Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo in Rome.
translation.zh: 在世界闻名的罗马圣天使城堡国家博物馆展出

translation.en: The second egg has been sold at auction numerous times
translation.zh: 第二颗蛋历经多次拍卖

translation.en: and currently is held in a private collection.
translation.zh: 目前在私人藏家手中

translation.en: You're not a cop.
translation.zh: 你不是警察

translation.en: You're right, I'm not.
translation.zh: 没错 我不是

translation.en: You know what I mean, Agent. Your badge is no good here.
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思 探员你的警徽在这儿不管用

translation.en: So no American cowboy stuff.
translation.zh: 别搞美国牛仔那一套

translation.en: Don't worry. Left my chaps at home.
translation.zh: 别担心 我把皮套裤放家里了

translation.en: You sure about this?
translation.zh: 你确定要这样吗？

translation.en: I know how he thinks. He's gonna do it today. Trust me.
translation.zh: 我知道他是怎么想的他今天会动手 相信我

translation.en: All right, then, here we go.
translation.zh: 那好吧 我们走

translation.en: -[man in English] Impossible. -I'm not asking.
translation.zh: -不可能-我不是在问你的意见

translation.en: You need to shut the museum down, evacuate your visitors,
translation.zh: 你需要关闭博物馆 疏散游客

translation.en: and seal all ingress and egress points immediately.
translation.zh: 马上封闭所有出入口

translation.en: And Interpol has the authority to compel me to do so?
translation.zh: 国际刑警有权强迫我这么做？

translation.en: Don't test me, Director.
translation.zh: 别来试探我 馆长

translation.en: You should listen to her.
translation.zh: 你应该听她的

translation.en: And who are you? Her bodyguard?
translation.zh: 你是谁？她的保镖吗？

translation.en: This is Special Agent John Hartley of the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit.
translation.zh: 他是美国联邦调查局行为分析小组特别探员约翰哈特利

translation.en: He's a consulting profiler who specializes in art crime.
translation.zh: 他是专攻艺术品犯罪的顾问侧写员

translation.en: You don't look like a profiler.
translation.zh: 你看起来不像侧写员

translation.en: Yeah, I get that a lot.
translation.zh: 经常有人这么说

translation.en: Forty-one hours ago, Agent Hartley received credible intelligence that
translation.zh: 41小时前哈特利探员收到可靠情报

translation.en: the most wanted art thief in the world, a man named Nolan Booth,
translation.zh: 说世界头号艺术品窃贼 诺兰布斯

translation.en: intends to steal the Egg of Cleopatra today.
translation.zh: 打算今天来偷克里奥佩特拉的蛋

translation.en: Who provided you this information?
translation.zh: 谁提供的信息？

translation.en: The Bishop.
translation.zh: 主教

translation.en: You cannot be serious.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑的吧

translation.en: My dear, The Bishop is nothing more than a boogeyman story in the art world.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 主教不过是艺术界的恶人传说

translation.en: It's a catch-all concept. It's someone to blame
translation.zh: 是一个泛称 你和你的执法圈朋友们

translation.en: when you and your friends in law enforcement
translation.zh: 没能力解决案子的时候

translation.en: are too incompetent to solve the case.
translation.zh: 就拿这个人出来背锅

translation.en: Listen to me, unless we stop it, that egg is gonna be stolen today.
translation.zh: 听我说 如果现在不停止争论那颗蛋今天就会被偷走

translation.en: In fact, it may already be gone.
translation.zh: 其实可能已经被偷走了

translation.en: [in English] Already gone, you say?
translation.zh: 你说已经被偷走了？

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, Inspector, I believe I owe your supervisor a call.
translation.zh: 请容我失陪 警官我想我需要给你上司打个电话

translation.en: Do you have thermal sensors in this room?
translation.zh: 这个房间里有热传感器吗？

translation.en: -Of course we do. -Show it to me.
translation.zh: -我们当然有-给我看看

translation.en: [director] You're wasting our time.
translation.zh: 你在浪费我们的时间

translation.en: What, may I ask, are you looking for?
translation.zh: 我可以问一下 你在找什么吗？

translation.en: Well, you see, Cleopatra's first egg is covered in 18-karat gold.
translation.zh: 你看 克里奥佩特拉的第一颗蛋表面覆盖有18K黄金

translation.en: And gold reflects radiation.
translation.zh: 黄金会反射辐射

translation.en: That egg should be reflecting the heat in this room.
translation.zh: 那颗蛋应该会反射这个房间里的热能

translation.en: It should be red, not blue.
translation.zh: 应该是红色 而非蓝色

translation.en: It's probably just an error in the thermal sensor.
translation.zh: 可能只是热传感器坏了

translation.en: Well, there's only one way to find out.
translation.zh: 只有一个办法搞清楚

translation.en: Hey, sorry, big man, but there's no food or drink in the museum.
translation.zh: 嘿 抱歉 小伙子博物馆里禁止饮食

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: No, no, wait a moment. What do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 不 等等 你在干什么？

translation.en: [woman] Relax, it's fine. He knows what he's doing.
translation.zh: 别紧张 他知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Seal the room. Now!
translation.zh: 封闭房间 马上！

translation.en: Move! Move!
translation.zh: 快追！

translation.en: He's heading for the exit.
translation.zh: 他去出口了

translation.en: Freeze!
translation.zh: 不许动！

translation.en: [guard 1 in Italian] He is here. Send reinforcements.
translation.zh: 他在这 派增援过来

translation.en: He's on the scaffolding.
translation.zh: 他在脚手架上

translation.en: We're gonna need more-- [grunts]
translation.zh: 我们需要更多…

translation.en: I know you. You're the… You're the slow bald guy that's been chasing me.
translation.zh: 我认识你 你是… 你是那个一直在追我慢吞吞的秃子

translation.en: What do you got in the bag?
translation.zh: 你包里是什么？

translation.en: You're American. What brings you to Rome?
translation.zh: 你是美国人 来罗马干什么？

translation.en: Gelato, the Colosseum.
translation.zh: 来吃冰激凌 看斗兽场

translation.en: -Oh, it's beautiful. Beautiful place. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是个美丽的地方-是啊

translation.en: -First time? -Yep.
translation.zh: -第一次来？-对

translation.en: [Booth] That was a fun foot chase, right? Lots of twists and turns. Hijinks.
translation.zh: 刚才的追逐很有趣吧？一波三折 一路狂欢

translation.en: Who knew it'd end up like this?
translation.zh: 谁想到结局会这样？

translation.en: -I did. -Right.
translation.zh: -我想到了-好吧

translation.en: Fun's over, Nolan Booth. Give me the bag, turn around,
translation.zh: 游戏结束了 诺兰布斯把包给我 转身

translation.en: put your hands behind your back. You're under arrest.
translation.zh: 双手放到身后 你被捕了

translation.en: Okay. Well, hold on one sec. I just have two questions.
translation.zh: 好的 稍等 我有两个问题

translation.en: Okay. Um…
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: First question, where'd you get that jacket?
translation.zh: 第一个问题 你的外套哪里买的？

translation.en: It's a statement piece.
translation.zh: 真亮眼

translation.en: Somewhere there is a very nude cow whispering… [whispers] …"Worth it."
translation.zh: 肯定有一头没皮的牛在某个地方低声说：“物有所值”

translation.en: And number two, on the whole arresting me thing, I totally get it.
translation.zh: 第二个问题关于逮捕我这件事 我完全理解

translation.en: You know, baby did a bad, bad thing. Yeah.
translation.zh: 本宝宝做了件大坏事 是的

translation.en: But you don't happen to have, like, a badge or somethin'
translation.zh: 但你不会刚好有警徽之类的东西

translation.en: tucked away in the turtleneck, do you?
translation.zh: 塞在你的领子里吧？

translation.en: I don't need to show you my badge because I've got a gun.
translation.zh: 我没必要给你看警徽 因为我有枪

translation.en: Here's the thing. You're putting me in a pickle.
translation.zh: 是这样 你让我有点难办

translation.en: Without identification, how do I know who you are?
translation.zh: 没有证件 我怎么知道你是谁？

translation.en: For all I know, you could be the bad guy,
translation.zh: 从我的角度看 你也有可能是坏人

translation.en: and I could be the other bad guy.
translation.zh: 而我是另一个坏人

translation.en: You're right. I am the bad guy.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我是坏人

translation.en: Now shut up and give me the bag before I shoot you in the mouth.
translation.zh: 现在闭上嘴 把包给我不然我就喂你吃颗子弹

translation.en: -I'm gonna give this to you. -[Hartley] Good.
translation.zh: -我会给你的-很好

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just gonna give it to you 'cause I don't even want it.
translation.zh: 给你就是了 我也不是很想要

translation.en: For the record, none of this feels good.
translation.zh: 我得说 这体验一点都不好

translation.en: Booth, don't move!
translation.zh: 布斯 不许动！

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 快点 我们走

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你干什么去？

translation.en: Asshole!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: [in English] Can you hold on to this for me?
translation.zh: 能帮我拿一下吗？

translation.en: -Thanks. -[sputtering]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [in Italian] What the hell? You idiot! Are you blind?
translation.zh: 搞什么？白痴！你瞎吗？

translation.en: [Hartley in English] Nice place you got here.
translation.zh: 你这地方不错

translation.en: Special Agent John Hartley, FBI. We met earlier.
translation.zh: 我是美国联邦调查局特别探员约翰哈特利 我们之前见过

translation.en: Aren't you a little outside your jurisdiction?
translation.zh: 你是不是有点超出管辖范围了？

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Good thing these guys aren't.
translation.zh: 好在这些人在范围内

translation.en: Hi, guys. Don't take your shoes off or anything.
translation.zh: 大家好 不用脱鞋了

translation.en: You sure you brought enough guns?
translation.zh: 你确定枪带够了吗？

translation.en: What can I say? I like to be thorough.
translation.zh: 我能说什么呢？我喜欢准备充分

translation.en: [Booth] No way, José.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: -The intrepid Inspector Das. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 勇敢的达斯警官

translation.en: I wouldn't have missed this for the world. I'll take that. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我可不想错过这个场面给我吧 谢谢

translation.en: -It's nice to meet a fan. -[Das] Oh, that's cute.
translation.zh: -见到粉丝真好-你真可爱

translation.en: You wanna know what else is cute?
translation.zh: 你知道还有什么可爱的事情吗？

translation.en: Because you're wanted in 18 separate countries,
translation.zh: 因为你在18个不同国家被通缉

translation.en: I get to choose which one of them detains you until trial,
translation.zh: 我要选一下在审判前把你拘留在哪里

translation.en: given your escape history.
translation.zh: 毕竟你有多次逃脱的记录

translation.en: What are you, six for six now?
translation.zh: 六次入狱又逃脱了吧？

translation.en: Yeah. One more and I get a Shawshank jacket.
translation.zh: 对 再逃脱一次我就能获得一件肖申克外套

translation.en: Keep making your jokes
translation.zh: 继续开玩笑吧

translation.en: because I'm about to send you to the worst place in the world.
translation.zh: 因为我马上就要送你去世界上最糟糕的地方

translation.en: Your Instagram account?
translation.zh: 你的Instagram账号？

translation.en: You know, I'm really starting to not like you.
translation.zh: 我真的开始不喜欢你了

translation.en: Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: Not like me? You don't even know me.
translation.zh: 不喜欢我？你根本不认识我

translation.en: We could have a lot in common.
translation.zh: 我们可能有很多共同点的

translation.en: [scoffs] Maybe I don't know you, but I've been building a profile on you,
translation.zh: 也许我不认识你但我在为你撰写档案

translation.en: ever since you stole William Strang's Lady with a Red Hat from the Tate
translation.zh: 自2014年你从泰特美术馆偷了威廉斯特朗的《戴红帽子的女士》起

translation.en: back in 2014.
translation.zh: 开始算

translation.en: You can't prove that was me.
translation.zh: 你没法证明是我偷的

translation.en: I got that on Etsy.
translation.zh: 那是我在易集网上买的

translation.en: I've been tracking your scores for a while.
translation.zh: 我追踪你的情况有一段时间了

translation.en: So let me take a crack at who I think you really are.
translation.zh: 让我来说说你究竟是个怎样的人

translation.en: Sure thing. Yeah.
translation.zh: 当然 好

translation.en: -Only child. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 独生子

translation.en: [Hartley] Dad's a Swiss cop, Mom's an American professor.
translation.zh: 爸爸是瑞士警察 妈妈是美国教授

translation.en: You started stealing between the ages of six and eight.
translation.zh: 你在六到八岁就开始偷东西

translation.en: You found out you had a real talent for it.
translation.zh: 你发现自己很有偷窃天赋

translation.en: It made you feel special, different.
translation.zh: 这让你感到与众不同

translation.en: You like to work alone. You don't like a team.
translation.zh: 你喜欢独自作战 不喜欢团队

translation.en: The only jobs you take are the ones that make the big, splashy headlines,
translation.zh: 你只干引人注目的大活

translation.en: which tells me that you only do it for the thrill and not the money.
translation.zh: 这说明你作案只是为了刺激而不是为了钱

translation.en: Are you insane? I love the money.
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？我很爱钱

translation.en: I'm not done yet. I'm just getting to the good part.
translation.zh: 我还没说完马上就要说到精彩的地方了

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢-不客气

translation.en: A lot of thieves out there who claim to only do it for the money.
translation.zh: 很多窃贼都说只是为了钱

translation.en: That's not unusual.
translation.zh: 这很正常

translation.en: But what is unusual is the risk that you take.
translation.zh: 但不正常的是 你为此承担的风险

translation.en: The chances.
translation.zh: 冒险分子

translation.en: It's as though you wanna get caught so you can escape,
translation.zh: 仿佛你是为了逃脱才想被抓到

translation.en: just to prove yourself all over again,
translation.zh: 只是为了再次证明自己

translation.en: and prove that you're better than everybody else
translation.zh: 证明你比别人都厉害

translation.en: and that you're worthy.
translation.zh: 证明你值得

translation.en: Worthy of what? This speech?
translation.zh: 值得什么？听这段演讲吗？

translation.en: Your father's love.
translation.zh: 值得获得你父亲的爱

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: How'd you find me?
translation.zh: 你怎么找到我的？

translation.en: Well, the same way I knew that you were gonna steal the egg in Rome.
translation.zh: 和知道你要去罗马偷蛋的途径一样

translation.en: [whispers] The Bishop.
translation.zh: 主教

translation.en: [whispers] The Bishop.
translation.zh: 主教

translation.en: [normally] Get him ready to move.
translation.zh: 准备带走他

translation.en: Booth, I'm curious.
translation.zh: 布斯 我很好奇

translation.en: How does it feel to be sold out by the most wanted art thief in the world?
translation.zh: 被世界头号艺术品窃贼出卖的感觉如何？

translation.en: I'm the most wanted art thief in the world.
translation.zh: 我才是世界头号艺术品窃贼

translation.en: You were.
translation.zh: 你曾经是

translation.en: [Das] Wait. Wait here.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: There's no chance I'm putting that thing in the same van as him.
translation.zh: 我不可能把那玩意和他放在一辆车上

translation.en: -See you at the airfield. -I'll see you there.
translation.zh: -机场见-到时见

translation.en: [in English] Door open.
translation.zh: 门开了

translation.en: All right. We're good.
translation.zh: 好了 没事

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Hi, there.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -You leaving town? -[Hartley] Flight's in an hour.
translation.zh: -你要走了？-飞机一小时后起飞

translation.en: Something up?
translation.zh: 有事吗？

translation.en: You could say that. Hmm.
translation.zh: 可以这么说

translation.en: Okay. What's going on?
translation.zh: 好吧 怎么了？

translation.en: [chuckles] Funny, I was gonna ask you the same thing.
translation.zh: 真有意思 我本来也要这么问你

translation.en: What are you doing with that?
translation.zh: 你拿这个干什么？

translation.en: Oh, this priceless piece of ancient cultural whatnot?
translation.zh: 这个价值连城的古老文化的玩意？

translation.en: Booth gave us a fake egg.
translation.zh: 布斯给了我们一颗假蛋

translation.en: I'll admit, Booth was my first thought too.
translation.zh: 我承认 我一开始想到的也是布斯

translation.en: Then I asked myself, "How well do you really know someone
translation.zh: 然后我问自己“你对72小时前刚认识的人

translation.en: you only met 72 hours ago?"
translation.zh: 了解多少？”

translation.en: And someone whose official credentials
translation.zh: 这个人的官方认证

translation.en: came solely by a written interagency communiqué.
translation.zh: 只有一份手写的跨部门公报

translation.en: So I called up the Assistant Director of the BAU at Quantico, really nice lady.
translation.zh: 于是我给匡提科行为分析小组的副组长打了个电话 她人很好

translation.en: She'd never heard of you.
translation.zh: 她从没听说过你

translation.en: -That's impossible. -[Das] Is it?
translation.zh: -那不可能-是吗？

translation.en: Yes, it's impossible.
translation.zh: 是的 根本不可能

translation.en: As impossible as a John Hartley with a Swiss bank account
translation.zh: 同样不可能的是约翰哈特利的瑞士银行账号

translation.en: that received an $8 million wire transfer
translation.zh: 在蛋被盗的同一天

translation.en: from an encrypted third-party on the same day the egg was stolen?
translation.zh: 收到了加密第三方800万美元的转账

translation.en: Quite a coincidence, wouldn't you say, Agent?
translation.zh: 很巧吧 探员？

translation.en: [officer 2 over radio] We have eyes on target.
translation.zh: 目标已锁定

translation.en: Listen, whatever you think this is, whatever you think I did, I didn't do.
translation.zh: 听我说 无论你怎么想事情不是你想的那样 我确实没做

translation.en: Someone's behind this. The Bishop, maybe even Booth himself.
translation.zh: 有人在背后操控可能是主教 可能是布斯本人

translation.en: -I'm being set up. -Maybe you are, maybe you're not.
translation.zh: -我被陷害了-也许吧 但也许没有

translation.en: Until I figure it out, I'm gonna keep you where I can find you.
translation.zh: 在我查清之前我要把你放在能随时找到的地方

translation.en: Now, normally, I'm not a vindictive person, but,
translation.zh: 通常我不是个报复心强的人 但是

translation.en: well, I trusted you and you hurt my feelings.
translation.zh: 我信任了你 而你却伤害了我的感情

translation.en: So I picked someplace extra special.
translation.zh: 所以我挑了个很特别的地方

translation.en: It's a bit of a black site. Kind of the land due process forgot.
translation.zh: 算是个黑牢 被法律程序遗忘的地方

translation.en: You're under arrest, Agent Hartley.
translation.zh: 你被捕了 哈特利探员

translation.en: Das, look at me. Look at my eyes.
translation.zh: 达斯 看着我 看着我的眼睛

translation.en: I didn't do this.
translation.zh: 不是我干的

translation.en: I don't believe you.
translation.zh: 我不相信你

translation.en: You a top or a bottom? [grunts]
translation.zh: 你要上还是下？

translation.en: Doesn't matter. Prison's gonna decide for us.
translation.zh: 不重要 监狱会为我们选择的

translation.en: You gotta be shittin' me.
translation.zh: 开玩笑吧

translation.en: [Booth] Well, I'll say one thing about ol' Inspector Das,
translation.zh: 关于达斯警官 我有句话要说

translation.en: she's got a real sense of humor.
translation.zh: 她真的很幽默

translation.en: Put 'er there, roomie.
translation.zh: 握个手 室友

translation.en: You're right, we should wash up first.
translation.zh: 没错 我们应该先洗手

translation.en: It's okay. You're safe here.
translation.zh: 没关系 你在这里很安全

translation.en: Except if they find out you're a cop. Then they're gonna wanna kill you.
translation.zh: 除非他们发现你是警察那他们会想杀了你

translation.en: [Booth] Bishop must have seen you coming from a mile away.
translation.zh: 主教肯定早知道你会到这一步

translation.en: Got your trust after selling me out.
translation.zh: 通过出卖我获取你的信任

translation.en: Can't run a con without gaining the mark's trust first, that's page one.
translation.zh: 诈骗首先要获得目标的信任这是基础知识

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
translation.zh: 我知道信任诈骗的套路 相信我

translation.en: [Booth] Well, you do now, that's for sure.
translation.zh: 你现在肯定知道了

translation.en: The same mystery thief who ratted me out is the same one who framed you.
translation.zh: 告密出卖我的神秘窃贼和陷害你的是同一个人

translation.en: That seems like a coincidence, don't you think?
translation.zh: 看起来很巧是不是？

translation.en: This is not a coincidence. This is a plan.
translation.zh: 这不是巧合 是计划好的

translation.en: In one move, The Bishop took out her lead competitor and lead investigator.
translation.zh: 一次行动中 主教同时干掉了头号竞争者和头号调查员

translation.en: -Two birds, one stone. -Egg.
translation.zh: -一石二鸟-蛋

translation.en: -What? -Two birds, one egg.
translation.zh: -什么？-一蛋二鸟

translation.en: It's kind of a lay-up. Even Post Malone gets it.
translation.zh: 这是一种连击手法 连波兹马龙都懂

translation.en: This is farm-to-table, right? Thank you.
translation.zh: 这是农场直送的吧？谢谢

translation.en: I don't understand why.
translation.zh: 我不理解

translation.en: Why would The Bishop go to the trouble of framing me when she already has the egg?
translation.zh: 主教已经拿到了蛋为什么还要费工夫陷害我？

translation.en: I mean, what's left?
translation.zh: 还剩下什么事要做吗？

translation.en: Three hundred million dollars?
translation.zh: 三亿美元？

translation.en: You're kidding. I never heard of a price tag like that.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吧 我没听过这么高的标价

translation.en: No one has.
translation.zh: 没人听过

translation.en: But you don't understand, that's not the price for just one egg.
translation.zh: 但你不明白 那不是一颗蛋的标价

translation.en: Here's the deal.
translation.zh: 是这样的

translation.en: Whoever brings this Egyptian billionaire all three eggs
translation.zh: 谁能在这位埃及亿万富翁

translation.en: by the night of his daughter's wedding gets all the marbles.
translation.zh: 他女儿婚礼之夜时送来三颗蛋就能拿走所有大奖

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Big Daddy Big Bucks' daughter,
translation.zh: 结果你猜这位大佬的女儿

translation.en: guess what her name is?
translation.zh: 叫什么名字？

translation.en: Stop guessing, it's Cleopatra.
translation.zh: 别猜了 叫克里奥佩特拉

translation.en: I mean, these people are horrible. But I like money, so…
translation.zh: 这些人真可怕 但我喜欢钱 所以…

translation.en: So how does that work?
translation.zh: 可这要怎么做？

translation.en: No one knows where the third egg is. It's never been found.
translation.zh: 没人知道第三颗蛋在哪儿从没人找到过

translation.en: I'm not gonna lie, that's a bit of a problem.
translation.zh: 我说实话 这确实是个问题

translation.en: I was gonna deal with the second egg first.
translation.zh: 我本来要先去搞第二颗蛋

translation.en: Then the rest.
translation.zh: 然后再考虑剩下的

translation.en: [sighs] All right, well, Bureau intel says that the second egg
translation.zh: 好吧 调查局情报说第二颗蛋

translation.en: is owned by an international arms dealer.
translation.zh: 属于一个国际军火商

translation.en: Sotto Voce. I know all about this guy.
translation.zh: 低语者 我很了解这个人

translation.en: His dad tried to strangle him when he was 14.
translation.zh: 他14岁时 他父亲试图掐死他

translation.en: Nobody can stand this son of a bitch. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 没人受得了这个混蛋

translation.en: Apparently, it left quite the impression on him.
translation.zh: 显然这给他留下了很深的影响

translation.en: And strangling folks became sort of a hobby for him.
translation.zh: 掐死别人成了他的一种爱好

translation.en: He's a big fan.
translation.zh: 他很喜欢

translation.en: [Booth] Sotto Voce is super scary.
translation.zh: 低语者很吓人

translation.en: But he's not above having a good time.
translation.zh: 但他也不介意享乐

translation.en: Throws a masquerade party every year for his top buyers
translation.zh: 每年他都会为顶级买家们办一场化装舞会

translation.en: in his I-probably-have-a-tiny-penis villa in Valencia.
translation.zh: 地点位于他在巴伦西亚的别墅那里大到让人怀疑他下面很小

translation.en: Gunrunners are a little touchy about their identity.
translation.zh: 走私军火的人对身份有点敏感

translation.en: So the Eyes Wide Shut thing takes the edge off for everyone.
translation.zh: 所以搞《大开眼戒》那种化装舞会让大家都能放松一些

translation.en: Now, what none of these evil one-percenters know
translation.zh: 然而全球最有钱的那1%的富人们不知道

translation.en: is that upstairs, locked away in a secret vault,
translation.zh: 在楼上的秘密金库里

translation.en: Dr. Shirtless has in his possession
translation.zh: 这个不穿上衣的博士锁着一件

translation.en: an ancient piece of pricelessness that I like to call…
translation.zh: 古老的无价之宝 我称之为

translation.en: Cleopatra's second egg.
translation.zh: 克里奥佩特拉的第二颗蛋

translation.en: And it's just begging for me to steal it.
translation.zh: 它正求着我去偷它

translation.en: I'd be on my way there right now if you weren't such a super cop.
translation.zh: 要不是你扮演超级警察我现在早就在去偷它的路上了

translation.en: -Don't do that. -[whispers] What?
translation.zh: -别这样-哪样？

translation.en: -Don't do that. -[whispers] Do what?
translation.zh: -别这样-哪样？

translation.en: -I know what you're doing. Listen. -[whispers] I'm not doing anything.
translation.zh: -我知道你在干什么 听我说-我什么都没干

translation.en: [whispering] These guys here, if they find out you're a C-O-P…
translation.zh: 这里的人 如果他们知道你是条子…

translation.en: This is a room full of convicted murderers and toilet vodka enthusiasts.
translation.zh: 这里满屋子都是判刑谋杀犯和厕所伏特加爱好者

translation.en: We gotta make sure they know you're not a cop.
translation.zh: 我们得保证他们都知道你不是警察

translation.en: -[yelling] Nyet politsiya. -[in English] Listen to me. I beg…
translation.zh: -不是警察！-听我说 我求…

translation.en: Guys? Nyet politsiya. Not a cop.
translation.zh: 各位？他不是警察

translation.en: This man is not a cop, all right?
translation.zh: 这家伙不是警察 好吗？

translation.en: Get that through your thick skulls right now!
translation.zh: 把这话记在你们的大脑袋里！

translation.en: He's a profiler for the FBI,
translation.zh: 他是联邦调查局的侧写员

translation.en: which does fall under the umbrella of law enforcement, but not a cop.
translation.zh: 确实算是执法人员 但不是警察

translation.en: It's similar, but it's not the same thing. It's a complicated backstory.
translation.zh: 很像 但不一样背景知识解释起来很复杂

translation.en: This is our good friend, Special Agent John Hartley.
translation.zh: 这是我们的好朋友约翰哈特利特别探员

translation.en: Let's give him a warm welcome to the prison, guys.
translation.zh: 让我们热烈欢迎他来到监狱 各位

translation.en: Thank you, guys. [whispering] I don't think anyone heard me. We're good.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家 我觉得没人听到我说话 我们没事

translation.en: All's quiet on the western front.
translation.zh: 西线无战事

translation.en: -Nobody's… Oh, no. -[objects clattering]
translation.zh: 没人…哦 不

translation.en: [Booth] Yep. Drago Grande heard. Here he comes.
translation.zh: 是的 德拉戈格兰德听到了 他来了

translation.en: [whispering] Okay, be cool. Don't embarrass me.
translation.zh: 好好应对 别让我丢脸

translation.en: [normally] Hello, sir.
translation.zh: 你好 先生

translation.en: Politsiya.
translation.zh: 警察

translation.en: You die.
translation.zh: 你死定了

translation.en: [whispering] Okay, he knows.
translation.zh: 好吧 他知道了

translation.en: He knows you're a cop.
translation.zh: 他知道你是警察了

translation.en: The jig is up.
translation.zh: 暴露了

translation.en: [whispering] It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: You can have mine. You need some nourishment.
translation.zh: 你可以吃我的 你需要补充营养

translation.en: [whispering] You should get up. You look like a little bitch right now.
translation.zh: 你应该站起来你现在看起来有点懦弱

translation.en: I say that as a friend.
translation.zh: 我是以朋友的立场劝你

translation.en: Okay, look.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着

translation.en: I don't wanna do the whole prison fight thing with you…
translation.zh: 我不想和你在监狱里斗殴…

translation.en: -[soft] You got this. I'm in your corner. -So please, no fight.
translation.zh: 你可以的 我支持你 拜托 别打架

translation.en: Let's just go back and finish our meals.
translation.zh: 我们各自回去吃饭吧

translation.en: -No. No-- -[guard in Russian] Back to your cell!
translation.zh: 各自回牢房！

translation.en: [Booth in English] God…
translation.zh: 天啊…

translation.en: All that working out.
translation.zh: 你白练了这么大块头

translation.en: You still get your ass spanked by a toothless man with tuberculosis--
translation.zh: 还不是被那个没牙的肺结核病人揍翻…

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: If you ever pull shit like that again, it'll be the last thing you do.
translation.zh: 你要是再搞这种事情你的日子就到头了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -You don't know me, Booth. -No.
translation.zh: -你不了解我 布斯-不了解

translation.en: You have no idea what I'm capable of.
translation.zh: 你不知道我能干出什么事

translation.en: Okay. Thank God, you're here.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢天谢地 你们来了

translation.en: [in Russian] The captain wants to see you. Let's go!
translation.zh: 长官要见你们 走！

translation.en: [in English] Him?
translation.zh: 见他？

translation.en: Oh, no, us. Okay.
translation.zh: 哦 我们俩 好的

translation.en: Hello, boys.
translation.zh: 你们好 小子们

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天

translation.en: You're the captain?
translation.zh: 你是长官？

translation.en: You might benefit from a little career change. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你换个职业可能比较好

translation.en: I mean, I'm… I don't think runway,
translation.zh: 我是说…我不是指做模特

translation.en: but definitely regional catalog work, fliers…
translation.zh: 但绝对可以为地区画报、广告传单拍照…

translation.en: She's The Bishop.
translation.zh: 她是主教

translation.en: No shit, dipdick!
translation.zh: 不会吧 混蛋！

translation.en: It's so nice to finally meet you, Mr. Booth.
translation.zh: 很高兴终于见到你了 布斯先生

translation.en: Such a thrill to be face-to-face
translation.zh: 我很激动 见到了

translation.en: with the second-best art thief in the world.
translation.zh: 世界第二厉害的窃贼

translation.en: Oh, I see what you did there. That's… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我懂你的小心思 那…

translation.en: Yeah, you got lucky a couple of times early on, you know?
translation.zh: 是 之前有几次算你走运 知道吗？

translation.en: But you can't name one time in the past year that you beat me.
translation.zh: 但过去一年 你一次也没有打败过我

translation.en: -Helsinki. -My parachute failed.
translation.zh: -赫尔辛基-我的降落伞坏了

translation.en: Jakarta.
translation.zh: 雅加达

translation.en: -My Segway sank. -Macau.
translation.zh: -我的电动平衡车沉海了-澳门

translation.en: Nobody knew that Miley Cyrus was going to be there.
translation.zh: 谁能想到麦莉塞勒斯会去呢？

translation.en: It was a completely unannounced show.
translation.zh: 那完全是场毫无预兆的演出

translation.en: You can have excuses or results.
translation.zh: 你要么找借口 要么看结果

translation.en: -[whispers] Not both. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 不能两者兼得

translation.en: What are we doing here? What do you want?
translation.zh: 找我们来干什么？你想怎样？

translation.en: To have a chat.
translation.zh: 聊一聊

translation.en: First of all, Agent Hartley,
translation.zh: 首先 哈特利探员

translation.en: please accept my sincerest apologies for the whole mix-up in Rome.
translation.zh: 请接受我对罗马闹剧的诚挚道歉

translation.en: You see, after I stole the egg in Bali,
translation.zh: 你看 我在巴厘岛偷了蛋之后

translation.en: I then made an $8 million deposit into an account registered in your name.
translation.zh: 就给以你名义注册的账号打了800万美元

translation.en: Then, all I had to do was sit back and wait for Das to take the bait.
translation.zh: 然后我只需坐等达斯上钩

translation.en: A few clever keystrokes and a well-timed call intercept.
translation.zh: 敲几下键盘 恰到好处地拦截电话

translation.en: [The Bishop] FBI BAU Director's office.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局行为分析小组组长办公室

translation.en: And poof. [gasps]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [mockingly] Bye-bye, Agent John Hartley.
translation.zh: 再见 约翰哈特利探员

translation.en: Hello, suspicious suspect.
translation.zh: 你好 可疑的嫌疑犯

translation.en: Funny, don't you think?
translation.zh: 是不是很有趣？

translation.en: Shut up. You deleted my life.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 你毁了我的人生

translation.en: And now I'm stuck in a cell with this idiot.
translation.zh: 现在我和这个傻子困在同一间牢房里

translation.en: Well, down to business then.
translation.zh: 那来谈正事吧

translation.en: At the risk of stating the obvious,
translation.zh: 不用说你们也知道

translation.en: I have the first egg in my possession,
translation.zh: 第一颗蛋在我手上

translation.en: and in less than 48 hours, I'm gonna have the second one as well.
translation.zh: 48小时内 第二颗也会到手

translation.en: But that leaves an issue. The final egg.
translation.zh: 但问题就在最后一颗蛋

translation.en: Well, too bad for you. Nobody knows where the third egg is.
translation.zh: 太遗憾了 没人知道第三颗蛋在哪儿

translation.en: He didn't tell you?
translation.zh: 他没告诉你？

translation.en: You didn't tell him?
translation.zh: 你没告诉他？

translation.en: -Didn't tell me what? -I don't know what she's talking about.
translation.zh: -没告诉我什么？-我不知道她在说什么

translation.en: Your cellmate here knows exactly where the third egg is.
translation.zh: 你的狱友知道第三颗蛋的准确位置

translation.en: She's lying. I do not know where the third egg is. I swear to God.
translation.zh: 她在说谎 我不知道第三颗蛋在哪儿我对天发誓

translation.en: [Booth] I know where the third egg is. I swear to God.
translation.zh: 我知道第三颗蛋在哪儿 我对天发誓

translation.en: Yes, that is me. Scratch that. That was me. I did say that.
translation.zh: 对 那是我 重来那是我 我确实说过

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me about the third egg?
translation.zh: 你打算何时跟我说第三颗蛋的事？

translation.en: I was never gonna tell you about the third egg because you're a cop.
translation.zh: 我没打算跟你说第三颗蛋的事因为你是警察

translation.en: [The Bishop] My offer to you, Mr. Booth, is this.
translation.zh: 我给你的条件是这样的 布斯先生

translation.en: Tell me where the third egg is, I'll get you out of here and give you 10%.
translation.zh: 告诉我第三颗蛋在哪儿我会把你弄出去 分给你10%

translation.en: Rock-hard pass.
translation.zh: 绝对不行

translation.en: I'm sorry we couldn't do business.
translation.zh: 很抱歉不能成交

translation.en: Well, perhaps a few more days in here
translation.zh: 也许在这多待几天

translation.en: with the prospect of thousands more to come
translation.zh: 看看未来各种各样的遭遇

translation.en: will help change your mind. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你们会改变主意

translation.en: I'll stop by once I have the second egg.
translation.zh: 等我拿到第二颗蛋会再过来

translation.en: Oh, and when I do, the offer's gonna be 5%.
translation.zh: 到时候分成就是5%了

translation.en: [in Russian] Thank you, Captain. Labor detail for them both.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 长官 这是他们俩的劳动清单

translation.en: [in English] Bye. Don't miss me too much.
translation.zh: 再见 别太想我

translation.en: Ta-ta!
translation.zh: 拜拜！

translation.en: Oh, hey, guys. [chuckles] Okay!
translation.zh: 你们好 好吧！

translation.en: [Hartley] If we work together to catch her,
translation.zh: 如果我们合力抓到她

translation.en: I can do things to The Bishop you can't do.
translation.zh: 我可以对主教做一些你做不到的事情

translation.en: [Booth] There's no need to be disgusting.
translation.zh: 别说这种猥琐的话

translation.en: Here we go. Three, two, one. Lift with your neck.
translation.zh: 来吧 三、二、一 用你的脖子发力

translation.en: I mean put her in prison. For life.
translation.zh: 我是说让她坐牢 终生监禁

translation.en: When that happens, guess who becomes number one art thief in the world again?
translation.zh: 到那时候 猜猜谁会成为世界第一的艺术品窃贼？

translation.en: Teamwork? It feels weird in my mouth.
translation.zh: 团队合作？从我嘴里说出来真奇怪

translation.en: Are you carrying your side?
translation.zh: 你那边使劲了吗？

translation.en: -I'm offended you'd even ask me that. -[grunting]
translation.zh: 你问出这种问题真是没礼貌

translation.en: -Do something. It's slipping. -Oh, relax, baldylocks.
translation.zh: -想想办法啊 要滑下来了-别紧张 秃头

translation.en: See? Teamwork.
translation.zh: 看到没？团队合作

translation.en: Team. Team. Team. [chuckling] It feels weird in my mouth.
translation.zh: 团队 我说出口太奇怪了

translation.en: It does.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Say what you will about Russian prisons, the soap is incredible.
translation.zh: 要说俄罗斯监狱有什么好东西肥皂真是太棒了

translation.en: -Are we doing this together or not? -No added chemicals or perfumes.
translation.zh: 我们要不要联手？ 没有添加化学品或香料

translation.en: It's just pure good ol' fashioned glycerin.
translation.zh: 只有纯粹而传统的甘油

translation.en: -Ooh. Smell it. -I'm not gonna smell it.
translation.zh: -你闻闻-我不要闻

translation.en: Sotto Voce's masquerade ball is tomorrow night,
translation.zh: 低语者的化装舞会就在明晚

translation.en: which means, if we're gonna beat The Bishop to the second egg,
translation.zh: 如果要赶在主教之前拿到第二颗蛋

translation.en: Oh. I'm so sorry.

translation.en: Tambwe, this is Agent John Hartley
translation.zh: 坦布韦 这位是约翰哈特利探员

translation.en: of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. It's a funny story.

translation.en: A lot of his colleagues have put a lot of your colleagues in prison.

translation.en: I'm sorry.

translation.en: Well, the guy's an arms dealer,

translation.en: so, you know, every square inch of this place is gonna be on lock.

translation.en: Two-man guard teams at every access point are signal rotated to keep them frosty.
translation.zh: 每个连通点都有二人组守卫按信号进行交班 以保持随时警戒

translation.zh: 87台动作感应8K摄像头监视范围相互重叠

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: You can learn. This is amazing.
translation.zh: 你会举一反三了 太棒了

translation.en: You are not sparkly enough.
translation.zh: 你还不够闪耀

translation.en: I'm gonna get you a matching vest to go with those pants.
translation.zh: 我去给你找一件能搭这条裤子的背心

translation.en: [Booth] Check, check. Roger Dodger. What's your 20, free bird?
translation.zh: 测试 收到 你的位置 自由鸟？

translation.en: You don't have to do that. I'm standing right next to you.
translation.zh: 你不必这样 我就站在你旁边

translation.en: I'm not used to using these stupid things,
translation.zh: 我不习惯用这些破玩意

translation.en: and I'm not used to working with a partner.
translation.zh: 我也不习惯和搭档合作

translation.en: We're not partners. This is a marriage of convenience.
translation.zh: 我们不是搭档 这是权宜婚姻

translation.en: I want a divorce and I'm keeping the kids.
translation.zh: 我要离婚 但孩子归我

translation.en: Let's just do this.
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: I'll get the thumbprint, you get Sotto Voce's phone.
translation.zh: 我去搞指纹 你去搞低语者的手机

translation.en: We've got a party crasher.
translation.zh: 我们有不速之客

translation.en: Yeah, it's no biggie. No biggie. We knew she'd be here.
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的 我们知道她会来

translation.en: We're here for the egg, not her.
translation.zh: 我们是来找蛋的 不是来找她

translation.en: Speak for yourself. I'm going in.
translation.zh: 那只是你的想法 我要进去了

translation.en: What are you doing? That's not part of the plan.
translation.zh: 你在干什么？这跟计划好的不一样

translation.en: Plans change.
translation.zh: 计划有变

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: The sculpture, I mean.
translation.zh: 我是说雕像

translation.en: I'm sorry, do we know each other?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们认识吗？

translation.en: It's just impossible for me to tell who you are with that mask on.
translation.zh: 你戴着面具 我看不出你是谁

translation.en: -How about now? -[gasps theatrically]
translation.zh: 现在呢？

translation.en: Agent Hartley!
translation.zh: 哈特利探员！

translation.en: So it was you all along.
translation.zh: 所以一直都是你

translation.en: Such a clever disguise.
translation.zh: 真是精明的伪装

translation.en: Well, I suppose you and Mr. Booth, wherever he is,
translation.zh: 无论他在哪 我猜你和布斯先生

translation.en: are here to try to beat me to the second egg.
translation.zh: 是想先我一步拿走第二颗蛋

translation.en: -Even the playing field. -Don't tell her anything.
translation.zh: -打成平手-什么都别告诉她

translation.en: I'm not here for the egg. I'm here to clear my name,
translation.zh: 我不是来找蛋的我是来洗刷我的污名

translation.en: which means all I need is you.
translation.zh: 所以我要找的只有你

translation.en: You're literally telling her everything.
translation.zh: 你什么都告诉她了

translation.en: We both know that this whole thing is gonna end with you in handcuffs.
translation.zh: 我们都知道这一切最后的结局就是你被戴上手铐

translation.en: Promises, promises.
translation.zh: 承诺

translation.en: Careful now. We don't wanna cause a scene.
translation.zh: 小心点 我们不想引人注目

translation.en: Don't care. I'm not letting you out of my sight.
translation.zh: 我不在乎 我不会让你脱离我的视线

translation.en: Oh, good, you're dancing with her.
translation.zh: 很好 你在和她跳舞

translation.en: Not bad for a convict.
translation.zh: 对一个罪犯来说 跳得不错

translation.en: Speaking of which, how's it going with your partner in crime?
translation.zh: 说到这个  你的犯罪搭档怎样了？

translation.en: Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
translation.zh: 他告诉你第三颗蛋在哪儿了吗？

translation.en: Well, if he did, I wouldn't tell you.
translation.zh: 就算他说了 我也不会告诉你

translation.en: That's a no. He must not trust you.
translation.zh: 那就是没有 他肯定不相信你

translation.en: You trust your partner?
translation.zh: 你信你的搭档？

translation.en: [The Bishop] What makes you think I have one?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得我有搭档？

translation.en: Well, no one would be able to pull off the scores you have alone.
translation.zh: 你的战绩可不是能独自完成的

translation.en: It's impossible.
translation.zh: 绝无可能

translation.en: So what now?
translation.zh: 那现在怎么办？

translation.en: You're gonna arrest me right here,
translation.zh: 你要在这里逮捕我

translation.en: without a badge or a gun, outside of your jurisdiction,
translation.zh: 没有警徽 没有枪 在管辖范围外

translation.en: and in front of a room full of criminals?
translation.zh: 当着一屋子罪犯的面？

translation.en: Is that your plan, Agent Hartley?
translation.zh: 这就是你的计划吗 哈特利探员？

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [Booth] Incoming! Got the print. Get the hell out of there.
translation.zh: 来了！指纹到手 快离开

translation.en: Or perhaps you just didn't think this all the way through.
translation.zh: 或者你可能没想清楚

translation.en: You're coming with me. Party's over.
translation.zh: 你跟我走 舞会结束了

translation.en: Watching you dance with this man at my party has made me quite jealous.
translation.zh: 看你和这个男人在我的舞会上跳舞让我很嫉妒

translation.en: Well, I had to get your attention somehow.
translation.zh: 我总得想办法引起你的注意

translation.en: Didn't I?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Like you said, it's your party.
translation.zh: 如你所说 这是你的舞会

translation.en: Apologies.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: We needed to get his phone,
translation.zh: 我们得拿到他的手机

translation.en: not waste time playing footsie with The Bishop.
translation.zh: 不是和主教调情

translation.en: Don't worry. I got it.
translation.zh: 别担心 我拿到了

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: You're kidding. Nice pull!
translation.zh: 开玩笑吧 干得不错！

translation.en: How'd you know Sotto Voce would cut in?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道低语者会打断你们？

translation.en: Well, Sotto Voce is a 5'5" alpha male with textbook Napoleon complex.
translation.zh: 低语者是个1米65的大男子主义者有教科书般的拿破仑情结

translation.en: So any time another male dances with the most desirable woman at his party,
translation.zh: 任何时候有别的男人和他舞会上最让人着迷的女人跳舞

translation.en: well, he has no choice but to step in and assert his dominance.
translation.zh: 他都必然会介入 宣誓主权

translation.en: You sneaky little minx.
translation.zh: 你这个狡猾的小贱人

translation.en: Where'd you learn that? Profiler school?
translation.zh: 哪儿学的？侧写学校吗？

translation.en: High school.
translation.zh: 高中

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们

translation.en: it is my sincere pleasure to welcome you all to my humble home.
translation.zh: 非常荣幸恭迎各位来到寒舍

translation.en: -[crowd chuckle] -Now's the time. He's speechifying.
translation.zh: 就趁现在 他在演讲

translation.en: [Sotto Voce] My father was a man of conviction…
translation.zh: 我父亲是个信念坚定的人…

translation.en: [Booth] Moving to two.
translation.zh: 进入第二步

translation.en: Oh! Terribly, terribly sorry, sir.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 先生

translation.en: You imbecile!
translation.zh: 你这个蠢材！

translation.en: -Oh… -Don't put your hands on me, peasant.
translation.zh: 别碰我 下等人

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm so sorry, sir. [in English] A thousand apologies.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 先生 我深表抱歉

translation.en: I don't need your apologies, I need a washroom.
translation.zh: 我不需要道歉 我需要去盥洗室

translation.en: Take him.
translation.zh: 带他去

translation.en: Right this way, sir.
translation.zh: 这边请 先生

translation.en: [whispers] Let's get you hosed down.
translation.zh: 我帮您冲洗一下

translation.en: [Sotto Voce] This pistol was my father's prized possession.
translation.zh: 这把手枪是我父亲的宝物

translation.en: I've kept it close to my heart since the day I killed him with it.
translation.zh: 自从用它杀了他之后我一直把它贴在心脏旁存放

translation.en: I was never permitted to touch this as a boy.
translation.zh: 我小时候从不被允许触碰它

translation.en: [Booth] Right this way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: [Sotto Voce] It's just like the one used by the Lone Ranger.
translation.zh: 和独行侠用的那把一样

translation.en: [in Spanish] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: What's going on there?
translation.zh: 那边怎么回事？

translation.en: Someone spilled wine on a guest. They're cleared.
translation.zh: 那人把酒撒在了客人身上他们没问题

translation.en: Something's off. I'm calling it in anyway.
translation.zh: 不太对劲 我得报告

translation.en: Don't be an idiot. You read too many spy novels. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 别傻了 你间谍小说看多了

translation.en: [Sotto Voce in English] I miss you every day, Pop-Pop.
translation.zh: 我每天都很想你 老爸

translation.en: And in his immortal words,
translation.zh: 就像他那句不朽的名言所说

translation.en: "The skilled hunter needs but one bullet."
translation.zh: “经验丰富的猎人只需要一颗子弹”

translation.en: -[guest] Bravo! -Enjoy your evening.
translation.zh: 祝大家今晚愉快

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: We gotta go.
translation.zh: 我们得走了

translation.en: [Booth] Here we go, nice and easy.
translation.zh: 好了 慢慢的

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: You're like a well-dressed wall.
translation.zh: 你就像堵穿了衣服的墙

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Trying to ruin the mission.
translation.zh: 试图搞砸任务

translation.en: Well, mission accomplished. Find the print.
translation.zh: 任务完成了 找到指纹

translation.en: God damn it!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on, you little bastard. Where are you?
translation.zh: 出来 小混蛋 你在哪？

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Gotcha.
translation.zh: 找到了

translation.en: Phone, phone, phone, phone.
translation.zh: 手机

translation.en: Okay, it's deepfake time.
translation.zh: 好了 换脸视频时间

translation.en: Sotto Voce.
translation.zh: 低语者

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [in Spanish] I thought Mr. Voce was still at the party?
translation.zh: 低语者先生不是还在舞会吗？

translation.en: Send a team.
translation.zh: 派人过去

translation.en: Security, we have a code red.
translation.zh: 保安 紧急情况

translation.en: [Das in English] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: You know, for a guy who claims he's innocent,
translation.zh: 作为一个自称清白的人

translation.en: you sure do hang around with a lot of criminals.
translation.zh: 你和罪犯走得还挺近的

translation.en: I am innocent.
translation.zh: 我是清白的

translation.en: He's a pretty damn good thief for his first time.
translation.zh: 作为第一次上手的贼 他很厉害

translation.en: -I'm not good at it. -[Booth] You are.
translation.zh: -我不厉害-你很厉害

translation.en: -Don't say that. -Don't sell yourself short.
translation.zh: -别这么说-别低估了自己

translation.en: -Shut up. -Hector Deflector over here.
translation.zh: -闭嘴-嘿 这位转移话题的先生

translation.en: He's not good at taking a compliment.
translation.zh: -闭嘴-嘿 这位转移话题的先生 他不擅长接受表扬

translation.en: I need you to understand, The Bishop is behind this entire thing.
translation.zh: 你要明白是主教在背后设计了这一切

translation.en: She set me up.
translation.zh: 她陷害了我

translation.en: Well, if this is all The Bishop's doing and you really are innocent, prove it.
translation.zh: 如果这一切都是主教干的你真的是清白的 那证明给我看

translation.en: Go on, detain your friend.
translation.zh: 来啊 拘捕你的朋友

translation.en: We're not friends.
translation.zh: 我们不是朋友

translation.en: -We're work wives. -We're not work wives.
translation.zh: -我们是职场伴侣-我们不是职场伴侣

translation.en: -We're sister wives. -We're not any kind of wives.
translation.zh: -我们是妻室伴侣-我们不是任何伴侣

translation.en: Shut up! Both of you.
translation.zh: 你们两个都闭嘴！

translation.en: You either arrest him or I arrest you both.
translation.zh: 逮捕他 不然我把你们都抓了

translation.en: What's it gonna be, Agent Hartley?
translation.zh: 怎么样 哈特利探员？

translation.en: -I'm sorry, man. -Oh…
translation.zh: 抱歉 伙计

translation.en: Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: -You're under arrest. -You're gonna listen?
translation.zh: -你被捕了-你要听她的？

translation.en: After all we've been through together…
translation.zh: 我们一起经历了这么多…

translation.en: [whispers] You love me?
translation.zh: 你爱我？

translation.en: [whispers] I hate you.
translation.zh: 我恨你

translation.en: -[in normal voice] Tight enough? Jesus! -[sighs] See?
translation.zh: 够紧了吗？老天！ 你看？

translation.en: I'm a good guy.
translation.zh: 我是个好人

translation.en: But sometimes I do bad things.
translation.zh: 但有时候我会做坏事

translation.en: -Hartley! -Let's grab that egg and get out of here.
translation.zh: -哈特利！-我们拿上蛋快走吧

translation.en: You don't wanna talk about what just happened?
translation.zh: 等等 你不想聊一下刚才的事吗？

translation.en: -What you talking about? -We had a moment.
translation.zh: -你说什么呢？-我们刚刚有火花

translation.en: -We didn't have a moment. -No, we had a moment.
translation.zh: -我们没有火花-我们有

translation.en: Looking for something specific or just browsing?
translation.zh: 有要找的东西吗 还是随便看看？

translation.en: You look awful.
translation.zh: 你看起来真糟糕

translation.en: Hmm. You know, there was an easier way in,
translation.zh: 有更简单的方法可以进来的

translation.en: but I doubt very much that you could've managed it.
translation.zh: 但我非常怀疑你们能不能办到

translation.en: Now that I have two out of the three eggs,
translation.zh: 现在三颗蛋我已经拿到了两颗

translation.en: I'll give you one last chance to take me up on my offer.
translation.zh: 我给你们最后一次机会接受我的条件

translation.en: -Well, here's my counteroffer. -[The Bishop] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 让我来还个价

translation.en: -You're under arrest. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -你被捕了-哦 我的天

translation.en: Read the room.
translation.zh: 你看看气氛啊

translation.en: I told you, this would end with you in handcuffs.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 最后你会戴上手铐

translation.en: You're so embarrassing. He's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: 你太丢人了 他太丢人了

translation.en: Tell you what, Agent Hartley.
translation.zh: 告诉你 哈特利探员

translation.en: You wanna arrest me?
translation.zh: 想逮捕我？

translation.en: Come…
translation.zh: 来…

translation.en: Arrest me.
translation.zh: 逮捕我吧

translation.en: I just want the egg. So, uh--
translation.zh: 我只想要蛋 抱歉 真尴尬

translation.en: Take it easy.
translation.zh: 慢一点

translation.en: This is easy.
translation.zh: 也不快啊

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 失陪

translation.en: Bro, I didn't… I didn't see the handcuffs coming.
translation.zh: 老兄 我没…我没想到会被铐上

translation.en: Mm, was a nice touch.
translation.zh: 感觉不错

translation.en: God, this is such a confusing erection.
translation.zh: 这个勃起太让人困惑了

translation.en: You can't ever tell anybody about this.
translation.zh: 绝对不可以跟别人说起

translation.en: -[Booth] I'll never tell anybody. Promise. -[Hartley] Okay.
translation.zh: -我不会告诉任何人 我保证-好的

translation.en: [Booth] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Oh, whoa, hold on, hold on. No, don't shoot.
translation.zh: 等等 不 别开枪

translation.en: I'm not trying to be a tattletale. We didn't steal your egg, okay?
translation.zh: 我并不想说人闲话不过我们没偷你的蛋 好吗？

translation.en: I mean, we tried.
translation.zh: 我们试了

translation.en: But she got it.
translation.zh: 但她拿到了

translation.en: [Hartley] He's telling you the truth.
translation.zh: 他说的是实话

translation.en: Is that so?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Thank you. Oh. All right.
translation.zh: 谢谢 好吧

translation.en: Would you like to make a confession, my lady?
translation.zh: 要坦白吗 女士？

translation.en: It's a pleasure doing business with you.
translation.zh: 和你做生意很愉快

translation.en: I told you they'd come.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你他们会来

translation.en: What the f--
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: Good morning, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 早上好 先生们

translation.en: Down here, beneath the bulls, no one will hear your screams.
translation.zh: 这里在斗牛场之下没人听得到你们的尖叫

translation.en: [exhales] That's called foreshadowing.
translation.zh: 这叫铺垫

translation.en: -I know what it's called. -Was making sure.
translation.zh: -我知道这叫什么-就确认一下

translation.en: You don't look like an English major.
translation.zh: -我知道这叫什么-你看起来不像英语专业的

translation.en: -Shut up. -Buongiorno, everybody!
translation.zh: -闭嘴-大家早上好！

translation.en: -Perfect! -[sing-song] I brought champagne.
translation.zh: -完美！-我带来了香槟

translation.en: I would introduce you, but I believe you've already met
translation.zh: 我要介绍你们认识不过我相信你们已经见过了

translation.en: my lovely business associate.
translation.zh: 我可爱的生意伙伴

translation.en: [Booth] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I told you The Bishop was working with somebody.
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 主教在和什么人合作

translation.en: It's a marriage of convenience.
translation.zh: 这是权宜婚姻

translation.en: You're familiar with that concept, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你们对这个概念很熟悉吧？

translation.en: You see, the dashing Mr. Voce here
translation.zh: 这位时髦的低语者先生

translation.en: already held the second egg in his possession.
translation.zh: 已经拥有了第二颗蛋

translation.en: So, I approached him with my own offer,
translation.zh: 我就向他提出了我的条件

translation.en: which brings us to the part
translation.zh: 现在就轮到了

translation.en: where you tell us where the third egg is.
translation.zh: 你来告诉我们第三颗蛋在哪儿

translation.en: Piss off for a thousand years.
translation.zh: 有多远滚多远

translation.en: Oh, bummer. I really wanted to do it the easy way.
translation.zh: 可惜 我本来真的很想用简单的方式

translation.en: That's okay. I'll get the information from you by hurting him.
translation.zh: 没关系 我会通过伤害他来让你开口

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
translation.zh: 不好意思 什么？

translation.en: I love this plan.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个计划

translation.en: [The Bishop] You two share a special bond.
translation.zh: 你们两个有特殊的羁绊

translation.en: Otherwise, why would you risk your lives together
translation.zh: 不然你们为何愿意一起出生入死

translation.en: attempting to steal the egg?
translation.zh: 试图偷这颗蛋？

translation.en: Isn't that right, Agent Hartley?
translation.zh: 对不对 哈特利探员？

translation.en: There is no bond between us. I barely know the guy.
translation.zh: 我们两个没有羁绊 我都不认识他

translation.en: Booth, tell her we're not friends.
translation.zh: 布斯 告诉她我们不是朋友

translation.en: -She knows about us, pal. -That's bullshit.
translation.zh: -她知道我们的事 伙计-胡说

translation.en: She knows about our special bond, that you were my best man.
translation.zh: 她知道我们特殊的羁绊你曾是我的伴郎

translation.en: Son of a bitch. He's lying.
translation.zh: 混蛋 他在撒谎

translation.en: If she hurts you bad enough, if she gets really creative with it,
translation.zh: 如果她把你伤得够狠有别出心裁的酷刑

translation.en: I'm gonna have no choice but to tell her everything.
translation.zh: 我就不得不全都告诉她

translation.en: Now, Mr. Booth, where is the third egg?
translation.zh: 好了 布斯先生  第三颗蛋在哪儿？

translation.en: Okay, here I go.
translation.zh: 好 我开始了

translation.en: [lazily] No, don't. Wait.
translation.zh: 不 别 等等

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: [Hartley] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I guess now we find out what kind of friend you really are, Mr. Booth,
translation.zh: 看来我们现在知道你是哪种朋友了 布斯先生

translation.en: because we're gonna go to my favorite place.
translation.zh: 因为我们要来到我最爱的位置了

The Red Army's at the gate, days from taking Berlin.

translation.zh: 肯定是水力发电

translation.en: which means there's running water somewhere down here.
translation.zh: 也就是下面某个地方肯定有流水

translation.en: Look at that door. Nothing hiding behind there.
translation.zh: 看看那扇门 后面肯定什么都没有

translation.en: How are we gonna get through this?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么过去？

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: You have got to be kidding.
translation.zh: 你是在逗我吧

translation.en: Is that your father's watch?
translation.zh: 那是你爸的手表吗？

translation.en: No. It's the watch from Pulp Fiction.
translation.zh: 不是 这是《低俗小说》里的手表

translation.en: Yes, it's my father's watch.
translation.zh: 是的 这是我爸的手表

translation.en: -I thought you said you smashed it. -I had it repaired. Is that a problem?
translation.zh: 我以为你说你砸了的 我找人修好了 有问题吗？

translation.en: No, it's not a problem. Glad you're not touchy about it.
translation.zh: 不 没问题很高兴你对它没有很敏感

translation.en: Please shut up.
translation.zh: 请闭嘴

translation.en: Uh, fun with magnets. All right.
translation.zh: 磁铁的乐趣 好了

translation.en: Dad…
translation.zh: 爸爸…

translation.en: Please be good crazy.
translation.zh: 请你惦记点好东西

translation.en: Forget the egg, let's just steal this stuff.
translation.zh: 别管那颗蛋了 我们偷这些东西吧

translation.en: [Hartley] We're not here to steal anything.
translation.zh: 我们不是来偷任何东西的

translation.en: Uh, actually we are. We're here to steal the egg.
translation.zh: 其实我们确实是来偷的 偷蛋

translation.en: [Hartley] You know what I mean.
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思

translation.en: [Booth] Oh, I steal it, it's stealing, and you steal it, it's what?
translation.zh: 我偷就是偷 你偷是什么？

translation.en: How about we just shut up? And by we, I mean you.
translation.zh: 不如我们都闭嘴吧？我说的我们指的是你

translation.en: [Booth] You're also rude too.
translation.zh: 你也很粗鲁

translation.en: Rude to boot.
translation.zh: 粗鲁至极

translation.en: [Hartley] How are we gonna find this egg?
translation.zh: 我们要如何找到这颗蛋？

translation.en: [Booth] I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Look for a box that says "MacGuffin."
translation.zh: 找一个写了“麦高芬”的盒子

translation.en: Do you know what this is?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么吗？

translation.en: This is…
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: Yes, this is a 1931 Mercedes-Benz Grosser 770.
translation.zh: 这是1931年产梅赛德斯奔驰770

translation.en: I could flip this for $25 million, easy.
translation.zh: 这辆我可以轻松转手以两千五百万美元卖出去

translation.en: There's, like, three of these left on the planet. Four!
translation.zh: 全球只剩三台 四台！

translation.en: There's four now.
translation.zh: 现在有四台了

translation.en: Three quarter-inch steel,
translation.zh: 2厘米厚钢材

translation.en: reinforced armor-plating, bullet-resistant glass,
translation.zh: 加强装甲钢板 防弹玻璃

translation.en: and a 24-karat gold inlay.
translation.zh: 24克拉金内饰

translation.en: This is a convertible tank.
translation.zh: 这就是个敞篷坦克

translation.en: And it's in mint condition. I bet you this thing still runs.
translation.zh: 而且车况完美我跟你打赌 它还能开

translation.en: Too bad it was driven by Nazi scum.
translation.zh: 它被纳粹人渣开过真是太遗憾了

translation.en: It's a shame we're gonna have to burn it.
translation.zh: 我们不得不烧掉它 多可惜

translation.en: How did they get it down here anyway?
translation.zh: 他们怎么把它弄下来的？

translation.en: They carry it down the stairs in tiny pieces and reassemble?
translation.zh: 他们把小零件运下楼再重新组装的？

translation.en: Through there.
translation.zh: 是从那里

translation.en: Place must have been built off one of those old copper mines.
translation.zh: 这里一定是在某个旧铜矿的基础上建起来的

translation.en: The shafts down here are massive and go on for miles.
translation.zh: 这里的通风井很大 延绵好几公里

translation.en: Build the bunker, bring in the loot, seal the shaft…
translation.zh: 建地堡 送来战利品 封闭通风井…

translation.en: Bob's your uncle.
translation.zh: 顺理成章

translation.en: Who's your daddy?
translation.zh: 顺手牵羊？

translation.en: [Hartley] That's not how it goes.
translation.zh: 这词不是这么用的

translation.en: [Booth] I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Well, labels, Nazis, dum-dums.
translation.zh: 标签 纳粹 小傻子

translation.en: Five-second rule.
translation.zh: 五秒规则

translation.en: It's fine. Totally fine. Not a scratch on it.
translation.zh: 没事 完全没事 一道划痕都没有

translation.en: Are you sure you don't wanna flip this one? I got a guy.
translation.zh: 你确定不想把它转卖掉吗？我有个熟人

translation.en: Let me save you the trouble.
translation.zh: 我帮你们省省力气吧

translation.en: Your entrances are bullshit.
translation.zh: 你每次出场都像见了鬼了

translation.en: Egypt? [scoffs]
translation.zh: 埃及？

translation.en: Did you really think I ran right off to the pyramids on your good word?
translation.zh: 你以为你说两句话我就真的跑去金字塔了？

translation.en: All I had to do was wait for you two to escape from Sotto Voce,
translation.zh: 我只需等你们两个逃离低语者

translation.en: and you led me right to the third egg,
translation.zh: 带我找到第三颗蛋

translation.en: which I'm going to take from you now.
translation.zh: 现在我就要从你们手中拿过来

translation.en: So, uh, hand it over.
translation.zh: 所以 给我吧

translation.en: Come on, don't be shy.
translation.zh: 来 别害羞

translation.en: [mockingly] Good job. Attaboy.
translation.zh: 做得好 孩子

translation.en: Drop your weapon!
translation.zh: 放下武器！

translation.en: [in Spanish] This way! On that side.
translation.zh: 这边走！那边也去人

translation.en: [in English] How did she find us?
translation.zh: 她怎么找到我们的？

translation.en: I followed you. She must have followed me.
translation.zh: 我尾随你们 她一定是尾随了我

translation.en: No shit!
translation.zh: 可不是嘛！

translation.en: Why are you shooting at them? I thought you were on their side.
translation.zh: 为什么对他们开枪？我以为你和他们是一边的

translation.en: I am on their side. They shot at me first.
translation.zh: 我是他们那边的但他们对我先开了枪

translation.en: How are we gonna get out of here?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么出去？

translation.en: We take that.
translation.zh: 用那个

translation.en: I don't think that's gonna make it up the stairs.
translation.zh: 我觉得它上不了楼

translation.en: -[cocks gun] -It ain't going up the stairs.
translation.zh: 它不用上楼

translation.en: Cover us.
translation.zh: 掩护我们

translation.en: -Go, go, go! -I'm trying!
translation.zh: -快点！-我在试！

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: -Throw it. -What?
translation.zh: -扔出去-什么？

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 马上！

translation.en: [Das in Spanish] You two with me, the rest of you follow.
translation.zh: 你们两个跟我来 剩下的跟上

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: [in English] I'm all out.
translation.zh: 没子弹了

translation.en: [in Spanish] Pull over!
translation.zh: 停车！

translation.en: -[male officer] Shit! -[engine revving]
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [in English] Bishop, the egg!
translation.zh: 主教 蛋！

translation.en: [Booth] You saved me.
translation.zh: 你救了我

translation.en: You love me. You love me like crazy.
translation.zh: 你爱我 你爱死我了

translation.en: -Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! -Shit!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: We're running out of road.
translation.zh: 我们无路可走了

translation.en: Hold on to something! If we stop, they'll catch us.
translation.zh: 抓稳了！如果我们停车他们会抓住我们

translation.en: Then let's get caught.
translation.zh: 那就让他们抓吧

translation.en: We can escape later. It works for me all the time.
translation.zh: 可以之后再逃跑 我一直是这么干的

translation.en: Make sure to kick clear of the car.
translation.zh: 记得跳车

translation.en: -I would like to workshop this idea. -Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 我想再讨论一下这个主意 该死！

translation.en: It's just like we drew it up, right?
translation.zh: 和计划的一样 对吧？

translation.en: Hartley?
translation.zh: 哈特利？

translation.en: Hartley?
translation.zh: 哈特利？

translation.en: Hartley?
translation.zh: 哈特利？

translation.en: You will be missed.
translation.zh: 我会想念你的

translation.en: Oh, shit! God damn it.
translation.zh: 该死！可恶

translation.en: Hartley?
translation.zh: 哈特利？

translation.en: Hartley? Hartley?
translation.zh: 哈特利？

translation.en: Hey, where are you, you big idiot?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在哪？傻大个？

translation.en: [Hartley] Who are you calling an idiot?
translation.zh: 你叫谁傻大个？

translation.en: I'm right here.
translation.zh: 我在这里

translation.en: -Did you just choose me over the egg? -No.
translation.zh: -你刚刚在蛋和我之间选了我吗？-没有

translation.en: -Well, it kinda looks like you did. -I didn't.
translation.zh: -看起来好像是这样-我没有

translation.en: You went running in there to rescue me.
translation.zh: 你跑到那里去救我

translation.en: I left my phone in there.
translation.zh: 我手机掉进去了

translation.en: You only have a finite amount of time to save it.
translation.zh: 要拯救它时间有限

translation.en: Stick it in a bag of rice, it's a whole thing.
translation.zh: 还要把它放进米袋 一整套操作

translation.en: You thought I was dead.
translation.zh: 你以为我死了

translation.en: I didn't think you were dead. I wished you were dead.
translation.zh: 我没想着你死了 我希望你已经死了

translation.en: I saw you splashing around. "Hartley! Hartley!"
translation.zh: 我看你四处拍着水花喊“哈特利！”

translation.en: Yes, okay, I wanted to pull you out,
translation.zh: 是的 好吧 我想把你拉上来

translation.en: save you, get your hopes up, and then pull you, shove you under.
translation.zh: 拯救你 让你燃起希望然后把你按下去

translation.en: Look, I'm not gonna make a big deal out of this.
translation.zh: 听着 我不会小题大做

translation.en: I'm not gonna gloat. It's not who I am.
translation.zh: 我不会幸灾乐祸 我不是这种人

translation.en: Would some people say that this is very embarrassing for you?
translation.zh: 有些人是不是要承认自己现在很尴尬？

translation.en: Yes, of course. Of course they would.
translation.zh: 是 当然 肯定要

translation.en: Probably everybody.
translation.zh: 也许大家都要

translation.en: But that's not important right now.
translation.zh: 不过现在都不重要了

translation.en: What's important is that you realize you lost and I won.
translation.zh: 重要的是你意识到 你输了 我赢了

translation.en: We.
translation.zh: 是我们

translation.en: We won. Together. Friendship. Teamwork.
translation.zh: 我们赢了 一起 友谊 合作

translation.en: It's called the moral of the story.
translation.zh: 这就是故事的寓意

translation.en: And something that I've been wanting to say for years
translation.zh: 我多年来一直想说一句话

translation.en: to your face is…
translation.zh: 当着你的面说

translation.en: Checkmate.
translation.zh: 将军

translation.en: Oh, that feels good.
translation.zh: 感觉真好

translation.en: I've got two eggs, you've got one, and you think you won?
translation.zh: 我有两颗蛋 你只有一颗你还觉得自己赢了？

translation.en: How's that work exactly?
translation.zh: 这是怎么算的？

translation.en: I don't have to win in order for you to lose.
translation.zh: 并不是一定要赢 你才会输

translation.en: That's the best part of this whole thing.
translation.zh: 这整件事最棒的地方就在这里

translation.en: As long as I have the third egg, you can't win.
translation.zh: 只要我拿走第三颗蛋 你就赢不了

translation.en: I don't care about the money anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也不在乎那笔钱了

translation.en: Honestly, look at your face right now.
translation.zh: 说实话 看看你现在的表情

translation.en: That face right there. Just… Yeah. Perfect.
translation.zh: 就是这张脸 太…完美

translation.en: Resting failure face. I mean, in a word, priceless.
translation.zh: 天生输脸 一句话 值了

translation.en: Also, it just gets better.
translation.zh: 还有更棒的

translation.en: As an added bonus, my friend here, at no extra charge,
translation.zh: 作为额外奖项我的朋友不会另收费用

translation.en: is gonna give you a lifetime supply of prison.
translation.zh: 他会给你 终生监禁

translation.en: So… [in accent] That's-a nice.
translation.zh: 所以…非常棒

translation.en: -Stand up. -Stand up.
translation.zh: -站起来-站起来

translation.en: Told you how this was gonna end.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你结局会如何

translation.en: You're right. I am the bad guy.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我是坏人

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
translation.zh: 我知道信任诈骗的套路 相信我

translation.en: You don't know me, Booth.
translation.zh: 你不了解我 布斯

translation.en: You have no idea what I'm capable of.
translation.zh: 你不知道我能干出什么事

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Look at him.
translation.zh: 看看他

translation.en: Resting failure face. Priceless.
translation.zh: 天生输脸 值了

translation.en: This whole time you were working for her?
translation.zh: 你一直都是为她做事的？

translation.en: Not for, with.
translation.zh: 不是为她 是共同合作

translation.en: -Like partners. -Yeah, we're both The Bishop.
translation.zh: -是搭档-是的 我们都是主教

translation.en: Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
translation.zh: 他告诉你第三颗蛋在哪儿了吗？

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: -Ready? [grunts] -Yep.
translation.zh: -准备好了？-嗯

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: There are two bishops in chess.
translation.zh: 棋盘上有两个主教

translation.en: -And a whole lotta pawns. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 还有很多卒

translation.en: [Hartley] I passed the first egg on to her in Bali.
translation.zh: 在巴厘岛 我把第一颗蛋给了她

translation.en: She took the second egg from Sotto Voce.
translation.zh: 她从低语者那里拿走了第二颗蛋

translation.en: And the third egg, well, the only way for us to get our hands on it
translation.zh: 而第三颗蛋 我们找到它的唯一方法

translation.en: was if you led us right to it, which you did.
translation.zh: 就是让你带路 而你做到了

translation.en: I thought for sure you were gonna see through my
translation.zh: 我本以为你肯定会发现

translation.en: "We're not partners, I gotta clear my name,
translation.zh: “我们不是搭档 我要证明自己清白

translation.en: I'm Johnny Law, blah, blah, blah."
translation.zh: 我是警察 诸如此类”

translation.en: To be honest, I thought I laid it on too thick in the prison.
translation.zh: 说实话 我以为我在监狱演得太过了

translation.en: -No, honey, you were so good. -No? Really?
translation.zh: -不 亲爱的 你特别棒-是吗？

translation.en: Appreciate that. What'd you think? You think it was too much?
translation.zh: 多谢 你觉得呢？是不是太过了？

translation.en: I have notes. Otherwise, pretty good.
translation.zh: 我都记下来了 除此以外 挺好的

translation.en: "Pretty good"? All right.
translation.zh: “挺好的”？好吧

translation.en: Let's just rewind for one second here.
translation.zh: 我们稍微回退一下

translation.en: You electrocuted him. You went "Downtown."
translation.zh: 你电击了他 你电了“中心”

translation.en: Yes. By the way, that hurt like hell.
translation.zh: 是的 对了 那个非常痛

translation.en: I know. I'm so sorry. I had to.
translation.zh: 我知道 很抱歉 我不得不那么做

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [The Bishop] It was the only way I could pass you a key to slip the cuffs.
translation.zh: 只有那样我才能递手铐的钥匙给你

translation.en: [sputtering] How did you get free?
translation.zh: 你怎么松开的？

translation.en: Well, anyhoo, the egg.
translation.zh: 随便吧 把蛋给我

translation.en: The egg.
translation.zh: 蛋

translation.en: That gun is soaking wet. There's no way--
translation.zh: 枪都湿了 不可能…

translation.en: I'm not a Navy SEAL.
translation.zh: 我不是海豹特种兵

translation.en: Third egg.
translation.zh: 第三颗蛋

translation.en: -Thank you. -Let's take a walk.
translation.zh: -谢谢-我们走吧

translation.en: So it was all a lie? Even the sob story about your dad?
translation.zh: 都是谎言吗？包括你爸那个催人泪下的故事？

translation.en: No. My dad was a con man, and I hated him.
translation.zh: 不 我爸确实是个诈骗犯 我恨他

translation.en: So I decided to become better than he ever was.
translation.zh: 所以我决定变得比他更厉害

translation.en: Beat him at his own game.
translation.zh: 在他的领域打败他

translation.en: Booth, don't be too hard on yourself.
translation.zh: 布斯 别太苛责自己

translation.en: You're good, really good, better than most.
translation.zh: 你很棒 比大部分人强

translation.en: We got nothing but respect for you.
translation.zh: 我们对你表示敬意

translation.en: Better luck next time.
translation.zh: 希望你下次运气好一点

translation.en: [The Bishop] We'd love to stay and chat, but we have an important wedding to attend
translation.zh: 我们很想留下聊天 但我们要参加一场很重要的婚礼

translation.en: and it turns out, we have the perfect gift.
translation.zh: 而我们恰好有完美的礼物

translation.en: [Hartley] No hard feelings, pal.
translation.zh: 别难过 兄弟

translation.en: It's what we do.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的职业

translation.en: [clicks tongue] None taken. Super fun time, guys.
translation.zh: 我不介意 很有趣

translation.en: See, I always appreciate a quality double-cross.
translation.zh: 我一直很欣赏高水平的出卖行为

translation.en: Serious question though, you guys have any sunblock?
translation.zh: 但我有个严肃的问题你们有防晒霜吗？

translation.en: I have no base. This is a spray tan.
translation.zh: 我没打底 这是喷雾美黑

translation.en: [man] A beautiful event like tonight happens only once in a father's life.
translation.zh: 一位父亲的一生中只会遇到一次今晚这样美好的宴会

translation.en: That is why when I arranged for my only daughter to marry,
translation.zh: 所以 当我安排我的独生女结婚时

translation.en: I spared no expense to acquire a gift unlike any other.
translation.zh: 我不遗余力获得了举世无双的礼物

translation.en: A gift fit for a queen,
translation.zh: 一份适合女皇的礼物

translation.en: my Cleopatra.
translation.zh: 给我的克里奥佩特拉

translation.en: Behold, for the first time in two millennia,
translation.zh: 看吧 两千年来

translation.en: all three treasured eggs have been reunited.
translation.zh: 三颗宝贵的蛋终于首次重聚

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Ed…
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！艾德…

translation.en: [Cleopatra] Ed Sheeran!
translation.zh: 艾德希兰！

translation.en: I love you!
translation.zh: 我爱你！

translation.en: Ed Sheeran, who knew?
translation.zh: 艾德希兰 谁能想到啊？

translation.en: God, he's so cute.
translation.zh: 天啊 他真迷人

translation.en: Yeah, I like that guy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他

translation.en: [male officer] Attention. This is an Interpol police action.
translation.zh: 注意 国际刑警行动

translation.en: Remain in your seats. This will be over shortly.
translation.zh: 坐在原位 行动很快会结束

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你们干什么？

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯-干杯

translation.en: -Oh, my God. Don't touch me. Excuse me! -Oi!
translation.zh: 天啊 别碰我 抱歉！

translation.en: Come on, then. Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 来啊！

translation.en: We'll take those. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 这些我们拿走了 非常感谢

translation.en: -Let's get out of here. -[chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Possession of stolen Nazi loot is a crime.
translation.zh: 持有被盗纳粹掠夺品是犯罪

translation.en: You're under arrest, father of the bride.
translation.zh: 你被捕了 新娘的父亲

translation.en: This is outrageous.
translation.zh: 不可理喻

translation.en: [both grunting] Get off me. Do you know who I am? I was in Game of Thrones!
translation.zh: 放开我 你们知道我是谁吗？我出演过《权力的游戏》！

translation.en: I'm Ed Sheeran, bitch!
translation.zh: 我是艾德希兰 混蛋！

translation.en: [Booth] This gouda is disappointing.
translation.zh: 这个高达奶酪真难吃

translation.en: Such a fancy yacht, you'd think they could stock some decent cheeses.
translation.zh: 游艇这么时髦我还以为会有好吃的奶酪

translation.en: That's not cheese. That's uncooked pork.
translation.zh: 那不是奶酪 是生猪肉

translation.en: I've heard tapeworms can be quite slimming.
translation.zh: 我听说绦虫有助减肥

translation.en: Surprised to see me?
translation.zh: 见到我很意外吗？

translation.en: Well, we're just surprised it took you so long to find us.
translation.zh: 我们感到意外的是你花了这么久才找到我们

translation.en: Oh, I actually… I came aboard yesterday.
translation.zh: 我其实…我是昨天到的

translation.en: You weren't the only one crying at the end of your lovemaking.
translation.zh: 你们床戏到最后的喊声有我一份

translation.en: You know, funny story, after Das picked me up on the beach…
translation.zh: 有趣的是 达斯在海滩上找到我后…

translation.en: Looks like you ran out of friends.
translation.zh: 看来你朋友不够了

translation.en: [Booth] She sent me to the only place on Earth that actually is worse
translation.zh: 她把我送到了地球上唯一一个 真的比她Instagram账号还糟糕的地方

translation.en: than her Instagram account.
translation.zh: 真的比她Instagram账号还糟糕的地方

translation.en: But then I remembered
translation.zh: 但后来我想起来

translation.en: that I'm pretty good at escaping from things.
translation.zh: 我挺擅长逃脱的

translation.en: So I did.
translation.zh: 所以我就逃了

translation.en: Look, am I upset about what happened back on the beach?
translation.zh: 我对沙滩上发生的事生气了吗？

translation.en: Absolutely not. All's fair in love and eggs.
translation.zh: 当然没有 一切都很好 有爱又有蛋

translation.en: I came to congratulate you both.
translation.zh: 我是来祝贺你们两位的

translation.en: Great. Glad you approve. What do you want?
translation.zh: 感谢你的认可 你想怎样？

translation.en: Well, I'm big on forgiveness. I always have been.
translation.zh: 我一向宽宏大量

translation.en: But I'm not so big on forget-ness.
translation.zh: 但我记性很好

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: I'm talking about my twist ending.
translation.zh: 我想说我的翻转结局

translation.en: You know the 300 million you guys got on the eggs
translation.zh: 你们出卖亿万富翁前

translation.en: before you double-crossed the billionaire?
translation.zh: 靠蛋获得的三亿美元

translation.en: Nice touch, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 品味不错

translation.en: Anyhow, I gave our friend, Inspector Das, a little jingle
translation.zh: 总之 我给了我们的朋友达斯警官一点小提示

translation.en: and I tipped her off about that secure Cayman Island account
translation.zh: 告诉了她你们存钱的

translation.en: you stashed it in.
translation.zh: 开曼群岛安全账户

translation.en: Turns out, it's not as secure as one might hope.
translation.zh: 结果那账户没有想象中那么安全

translation.en: Take it all.
translation.zh: 都取走

translation.en: [Booth] See? Now, we're even.
translation.zh: 看？我们扯平了

translation.en: Everyone loses, no one gets the money and we can all be friends again.
translation.zh: 大家都输了 没人拿到钱我们又可以做朋友了

translation.en: Cut the shit. What's the offer?
translation.zh: 别废话了 你有什么条件？

translation.en: There's a new score.
translation.zh: 有一个新目标

translation.en: Double the payout, triple the challenge, plus, here's the best part.
translation.zh: 资金翻倍 挑战翻三番另外最棒的地方来了

translation.en: It's a three-thief job. [mouthing] One, two, three.
translation.zh: 这是三人合作的盗窃工作一、二、三

translation.en: And let me guess, if we don't say yes,
translation.zh: 我猜猜 如果我们不同意

translation.en: then Inspector Das is on her way right now to arrest us.
translation.zh: 达斯警官已经在来抓我们的路上了

translation.en: Yes, in very fast boats.
translation.zh: 是的 开着超快的船

translation.en: Know what I think is funny, Booth?
translation.zh: 知道我觉得哪里好笑吗 布斯？

translation.en: Vin Diesel's audition tape for Cats? It exists.
translation.zh: 范迪塞尔面试《猫》的视频？真的存在

translation.en: The fact that you think the two of us would ever team up with you.
translation.zh: 就是你以为我们会再次与你合作

translation.en: Get off the boat.
translation.zh: 下船

translation.en: Great. I'll, uh, send you both a sharpened toothbrush.
translation.zh: 很好 我会给你们一人寄一把削尖的牙刷

translation.en: Wait, stop.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: [sighs] Look, we need a new score now anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我们现在也需要偷新目标

translation.en: I know he drives you crazy, but he's good.
translation.zh: 我知道他让你烦躁 但他挺厉害的

translation.en: -And you two work well together. -No, we don't.
translation.zh: -你们俩合作无间-不 并没有

translation.en: We kinda do.
translation.zh: 我们有的

translation.en: Do you trust me?
translation.zh: 你相信我吗？

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 永远相信

translation.en: -You love me? -Big time.
translation.zh: -你爱我吗？-非常爱

translation.en: That's all we need.
translation.zh: 我们有彼此就够了

translation.en: [both] What are we stealing?
translation.zh: 我们要偷什么？

translation.en: This.
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: [in Italian] It's abandoned. They're not here.
translation.zh: 弃船了 他们不在船上

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了？

translation.en: What could possibly go wrong?
translation.zh: 能有什么问题呢？

translation.en: Everything.
translation.zh: 一切都会有问题

translation.en: [The Bishop] Don't miss me too much.
translation.zh: 别太想我

translation.en: [sing-song] Ta-ta!
translation.zh: 拜拜！
